attributes.action: Insist that all MP's that have taken money for Mortgages be charged by the Police with Fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many of our Members of Parliment have taken money from the Government for Mortgage payments that they either do not have or was paid up many many months ago, if it was a member of the Public they would have now been prosecuted and the same should happen to the crooked MP's, it should not be a law for one and a different one for MP's

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
